title: Display Rich Colors
description: Displays a list of all supported named colors from the Rich library.

step1.statement: The following is a list of all named colors supported by the Rich library, which is used for styling this application's interface.

step2.statement: You can use any of these names (e.g., 'orange1', 'deep_sky_blue3') in the 'color' property of your recipes to customize their appearance in the menu.
